trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around March 25th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading next door to my friend's house when I looked up toward the west and saw two identical lights floating in mid air. they flckered like fire and made a very faint rumbling noise. I stood there for about three minutes, then I hurried and ran to my friend's house I told him to hurry and come out side we ran out on to his drive way, I then pointed at the pair of lights. we stood there for one minute untill the lights moved as one straight down then hovered toward the south and and light speed darted toward Kingsley Feild air base the vanished in thin air!!! Ive never seen anything like it before in my life
Summary: 2 lights right to left, moved as if it was one
